response.overview: Fragility and vigour, eurythmics, perfection and an incredibly powerful voice are all parts of the singer Polina Gagarina phenomenon. Sochi is in luck! The charming Gagarina is coming to the RED ARENA’s grand stage once again.  This is a tremendous, must-see show! The main thing about any Polina Gagarina performance is the live sound and her unbelievably powerful voice. Everyone loves her hit songs “No more drama”, “The show’s over” and “Disarmed” – they never fail to pluck the audiences’ heart strings. Light installations and stunning dance routines will strengthen the impression of the singers’ incredible vocals.
response.title: Polina Gagarina RED ARENA Concert
